Method Detail

createTag

def createTag()
Instantiate the concrete tag class under test.
Returns:
tag instance to be tested

getResult

def getResult()
Get the result of the tag execution (i.e. the contents of the StringWriter containing the tag output). This is typically called after executing doEndTag() or other tag methods that write to the page context output stream.
Returns:
string output

mockPageContext

def mockPageContext()
Create a mock page context that writes output to a StringWriter. The resulting output can be retrieved by calling getResult().
Returns:
mocked page context

setup

def setup()
